doc:
David Rappaport https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Rappaport 0 David Stephen Rappaport (23 November 1951 – 2 May 1990) was an English actor with dwarfism. He was known for his roles in the films Time Bandits and The Bride, and television series such as L.A. Law, The Wizard and Captain Planet and the Planeteers. He was 3' 11" (1.19 m) in height. David_Stephen_Rappaport ( 23_November_1951 – 2_May_1990 ) was an_English_actor with dwarfism .
